content: a chain space literally a space made by chains in the pattern rather than into previously made stitches the abbreviation for a chain is typically written as chain slip_stitch figure 3 making a slip_stitch source fity club a slip_stitch is where you insert a hook into a stitch below yarn over then pull through both the stitch and the loop on the hook fun fact in uk terminology this is considered a single_crochet the typical abbreviation for this is slip_stitch copyright © 2025 by megyn burnett all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only this pattern or parts of it may through the stitch you then yarn over again and pull through two loops on the hook the abbreviation for this is single_crochet half-double_crochet figure 5 making a half-double_crochet source crochetideaz blogspot com a half-double_crochet is like a single_crochet but you add an extra yarn over before inserting the hook into the next stitch the abbreviation for this is half_double_crochet crochetmakingfun blogspot com a double_crochet is like a half-double_crochet except you only yarn over and pull through two loops at a time instead of pulling through all three loops to finish the stitch so the sequence is yo insert hook yo pull through stitch yo pull through two loops yo pull through two loops the abbreviation for this is double_crochet triple crochet figure 7 making a triple crochet source amigurumi today a triple crochet is like a double_crochet except you yarn over twice at the beginning this means that after pulling through the stitch you will yarn over and pull through two loops three times fun fact this stitch is also sometimes called a treble_crochet the abbreviation for this is treble_crochet copyright © 2025 by megyn burnett all rights reserved this
